channel.title: Servers~~~~~Any Illegal?
channel.description:
Are all servers truly legal? Are some illegal? Could you please tell me which are illegal if some are? I don't know if any server sources were stolen from Jagex.
*tries to avoid most trouble possible*
TheCyberMan
P.S. I know the clients are illegal :/ I wish someone could make one from scratch that we can build on. Check out my thread here-[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,502216.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,502216.0.html[/url]- for more info on the custom client idea.

item.title: Servers~~~~~Any Illegal?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Servers are not illegal, distributing the rs2 client is.

Read full topic

item.title: Servers~~~~~Any Illegal?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Don’t worry about it. Nothing bad will happen to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Servers~~~~~Any Illegal?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

The server is your code and they can’t do anything about that. Now if you modify their client, they might be able to do something, but not to you. If they say your are doing something illegal, simply ask them what. If they say you are hosting a modified client then they are simply bullshitting. The people that would be hosting the modified client would be like mediafire, or whatever the direct download place you used for your webclient. Also read this, I found it funny.
https://www.moparisthebest.com/lawstuff

Read full topic

item.title: Servers~~~~~Any Illegal?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

I heard something about the server being Jagex’s and the client being totally yours.

You can do what I did, credit Jagex 100% for the work, creativity and everything else of the server. I haven’t gotten shut down yet from that

Read full topic

item.title: Servers~~~~~Any Illegal?
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Well, the server sources were coded from scratch. So technically they shouldn’t be illegal. The clients, however, were Jagex’s property; so yes, they are illegal.

Read full topic

item.title: Servers~~~~~Any Illegal?
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

All servers are illeagle (sorry for spelling mistake, i have learning dificulties), tey are classed as stolen property

Read full topic
